original_title: At least 9 killed, over 20 injured after bus topples into river at Manampitiya
original_body_lines: At least nine passengers were reported dead and more than 20 persons injured after a bus from Polonnaruwa to Kaththankudy collided on the Kotaleeya bridge at Manampitiya and toppled into the river this evening.
Police said the injured are being admitted to the Polonnaruwa and Manampitiya Hospitals.
